description: Improvement: authorize account manager to offer service credits for recent delivery issues
Mentorship Programs: Pair experienced employees with newcomers to provide guidance, foster a sense of belonging, and enhance retention.
Wellness Initiatives: Implement wellness programs that focus on work-life balance, stress management, and mental health support, which can contribute to higher employee satisfaction and retention.
Skill Expansion: Offer opportunities for employees to learn new skills or explore different roles within the organization, rekindling their interest and engagement.
